resources.string:
Enactus,BITS Hyderabad
 
 Enactus, an international non-profit organisation, aspires to enable progress through entrepreneurial action. Working with leaders in business and higher education, Enactus mobilises university students to accomplish its goals through outreach projects that improve quality of life of the needy.
Project Vyanjan aims to provide entrepreneurial training to women in nearby villages to help them become financially independent.
This Arena, keeping in tone with the nature of the fest, we bring to you a range of healthy dishes and juices. Come enjoy yourself and contribute your bit to the betterment of people's lives.

"NSS,BITS Hyderabad \n \n Games and Sports are a part of life. And it is a slice of privilege that NSS,BITS (National Service Scheme) chooses to bring to some less fortunate children during Arena.
NSS, BITS-Pilani Hyderabad Campus - in association with Arena 2015 - announces VIHANG, it\'s very first attempt to engage the students from less privileged background in the surrounding government schools in a set of sporting contests. Vihang shall be held as a pre-Arena event. A myriad of games - from cricket to to sac race to sprints to kho-kho and kabaddi - have been planned for different age groups.
This Arena, we hope to bring a smile to those little faces, by opening for them a word of sporting zeal and glory. We hope you will be with us!"

Sports is one of those indispensable little gears that makes this world tick.And even as nerdy engineers, we have not truly experienced life until we hope and despair in the field- or on the bleachers-enraptured in the throes of sporting passion. Whether player or observer , being at the heart of any sport is almost a religious experience, and this year, BITS Pilani Hyderabad Campus brings to you that nirvana of ultimate sporting glory. ARENA-2015 - BITS-Pilani Hyderabad national annual sporting festival, is here, and it believes in the path of Sports Unto Salvation. Michael Phelps believes You put a limit anything. The more you dream,the farther you get. And this Arena is prepared to do echo just that and push its limit one more step further. This sporting extravaganza of our campus kicked off a mere two years ago, but the growth from Arena to Arena has been exponential.Arena has firmly established itself on the sporting map. With the medals Galore from Sports Meet our sportspersons are gearing up for an encore in this National Sports Meet-This time on their Home Turf. Organisers, too are just as busy , priming our excellent infrastructure for an experience that every participant can swear by. From a footfall of 4500 last year the fracnhised hard work of our departments look to atleast double the number or more, for at BITS-Pilani Hyderabad Campus, even the sky is no limit. So come rediscover the divine ardour of Sports, this Arena. Let the Game Begin!!! Sports Unto Salvation

The first edition of Arena took place in April 2013. The success of Intra-Hyderabad Sports fest motivated the sport enthusiasm of the campus to take a step further and start its own Nationwide Sports festival Arena13. Arena was launched to bring out the sporting spirit in students from different parts of the country, and to create an opportunity for them to take part in various sporting disciplines, over a period of three days. Arena13 saw around 2400 participants from all across the nation participate in many indoor and outdoor sports events, held for both boys and girls. The fest offered a comprehensive entertainment and sportive atmosphere, not only competitions but also extravagant entertainment and professional shows like laser show and Jugalbandi

Birla Institute Of Technology and Science-Pilani, Hyderabad, which houses around 2800 multi-faceted students from diverse regions of the country, aims to equip them with skills essential to make them valuable citizens of tomorrow India.
Since its inception in the year 2008, the campus main objective have been to impart high quality education in the field technology, research, science and innovation.The students are inspired encouraged to sharpen their creative and fine-art skills, to keep in tune with the belief of a holistic, educational environment.
BITS-Pilani, Hyderabad, has exceptional sports facilities, with well-furnished, capacious grounds and courts.
The students show great enthusiasm in sports activities and the college sports teams have won many laurels in different sports festivals, nationwide.
